comment: I am a victim of DV and there is nothing worse than a perpetrator portraying herself or himself as the victim.
commentable_entity.ask: Gag Order Amber Heard & her legal team.
commentable_entity.title: Gag Order Amber Heard & her legal team.
commentable_entity.description:
1. Gag orders — issued by a court, government, or private entity — require an individual to refrain from making public comments.

Amber Heard has been proven to be a Domestic Abuser.. inflicting horrible acts of violence via verbally, mentally and physically towards her ex-husband Johnny Depp. However, she continues to try and play the victim.

During the trial, Ms. Heard stated:

“I just want Johnny to leave me alone. I've said that for years now.”

However, this seems to be further from the truth, as we have continued seeing Amber and her legal team pushing to continue defaming Johnny Depp.. along with now making a mockery of the Court System, since the end of the trial.

Throughout the trial.. extensive evidence was presented of Amber Heard taunting, mocking, threatening and other various abusive actions from Ms. Heard towards Mr. Depp. Witness after witness stood on the stand, to shed light on the truth against Ms. Heard’s lies.. and clear all false accusations about Mr. Depp. The recordings did not lie. The photos, did not lie. Witnesses on behalf of Johnny, did not lie. Amber Heard DID lie. Her sister DID lie. She damaged Johnny Depp and tried to destroy his image to the world, portraying him as a villain.. all while trying to act as if she were the victim, when in fact.. she was the true domestic abuser. We have seen and listened to the truth.. but not once has she accepted responsibility for her actions. Instead, she and her legal team continue to defame, belittle and falsely accuse not only Johnny Depp.. but now also the Juror(s). She continues to blame everybody else. Amber and her team continue to accept guest spots on show after show.. giving interviews, and feeding the media via Television, Blogs and News articles with absolute lies.

Amber Heard also stated:
“I want to move on with my life. I want to move on, I want to move on, I want Johnny to move on, too. I want him to leave me alone.”

While Mr. Depp has moved on.. she continues on a malicious mission to try and destroy Johnny. So.. we, the people petition that a Gag Order be placed on Amber Heard, and her legal team. We also ask that all media (whether through television, newspaper, online blog site, radio, etc..) channels please STOP giving her platforms to continue spewing these lies. She does NOT speak for true domestic violence survivors. Instead, she causes more problems for domestic violence survivors, especially making it harder for women survivors to speak up & truly be believed. 

As a different petition shared; Hollywood and the entertainment industry must not ignore the suffering of Heard's victim(s), and must not glamorize a domestic abuser. Men are victims of domestic abuse, just like women. This must be recognized, and action must be taken to prevent a known abuser from being celebrated within the entertainment industry. 
PLEASE STOP GIVING HER A PLATFORM TO SPEAK LIES. PLEASE PLACE A GAG ORDER ON MISS HEARD AND HER LEGAL TEAM.
commentable_entity.letter_body: Gag Order placed on Amber Heard & her entire legal team.

comment: Lies, lies  lies  all that comes from her and elaine
commentable_entity.ask: Gag Order Amber Heard & her legal team.
commentable_entity.title: Gag Order Amber Heard & her legal team.
commentable_entity.description:
1. Gag orders — issued by a court, government, or private entity — require an individual to refrain from making public comments.

Amber Heard has been proven to be a Domestic Abuser.. inflicting horrible acts of violence via verbally, mentally and physically towards her ex-husband Johnny Depp. However, she continues to try and play the victim.

During the trial, Ms. Heard stated:

“I just want Johnny to leave me alone. I've said that for years now.”

However, this seems to be further from the truth, as we have continued seeing Amber and her legal team pushing to continue defaming Johnny Depp.. along with now making a mockery of the Court System, since the end of the trial.

Throughout the trial.. extensive evidence was presented of Amber Heard taunting, mocking, threatening and other various abusive actions from Ms. Heard towards Mr. Depp. Witness after witness stood on the stand, to shed light on the truth against Ms. Heard’s lies.. and clear all false accusations about Mr. Depp. The recordings did not lie. The photos, did not lie. Witnesses on behalf of Johnny, did not lie. Amber Heard DID lie. Her sister DID lie. She damaged Johnny Depp and tried to destroy his image to the world, portraying him as a villain.. all while trying to act as if she were the victim, when in fact.. she was the true domestic abuser. We have seen and listened to the truth.. but not once has she accepted responsibility for her actions. Instead, she and her legal team continue to defame, belittle and falsely accuse not only Johnny Depp.. but now also the Juror(s). She continues to blame everybody else. Amber and her team continue to accept guest spots on show after show.. giving interviews, and feeding the media via Television, Blogs and News articles with absolute lies.

Amber Heard also stated:
“I want to move on with my life. I want to move on, I want to move on, I want Johnny to move on, too. I want him to leave me alone.”

While Mr. Depp has moved on.. she continues on a malicious mission to try and destroy Johnny. So.. we, the people petition that a Gag Order be placed on Amber Heard, and her legal team. We also ask that all media (whether through television, newspaper, online blog site, radio, etc..) channels please STOP giving her platforms to continue spewing these lies. She does NOT speak for true domestic violence survivors. Instead, she causes more problems for domestic violence survivors, especially making it harder for women survivors to speak up & truly be believed. 

As a different petition shared; Hollywood and the entertainment industry must not ignore the suffering of Heard's victim(s), and must not glamorize a domestic abuser. Men are victims of domestic abuse, just like women. This must be recognized, and action must be taken to prevent a known abuser from being celebrated within the entertainment industry. 
PLEASE STOP GIVING HER A PLATFORM TO SPEAK LIES. PLEASE PLACE A GAG ORDER ON MISS HEARD AND HER LEGAL TEAM.

commentable_entity.title: Gag Order Amber Heard & her legal team.
commentable_entity.description:
1. Gag orders — issued by a court, government, or private entity — require an individual to refrain from making public comments.

Amber Heard has been proven to be a Domestic Abuser.. inflicting horrible acts of violence via verbally, mentally and physically towards her ex-husband Johnny Depp. However, she continues to try and play the victim.

During the trial, Ms. Heard stated:

“I just want Johnny to leave me alone. I've said that for years now.”

However, this seems to be further from the truth, as we have continued seeing Amber and her legal team pushing to continue defaming Johnny Depp.. along with now making a mockery of the Court System, since the end of the trial.

Throughout the trial.. extensive evidence was presented of Amber Heard taunting, mocking, threatening and other various abusive actions from Ms. Heard towards Mr. Depp. Witness after witness stood on the stand, to shed light on the truth against Ms. Heard’s lies.. and clear all false accusations about Mr. Depp. The recordings did not lie. The photos, did not lie. Witnesses on behalf of Johnny, did not lie. Amber Heard DID lie. Her sister DID lie. She damaged Johnny Depp and tried to destroy his image to the world, portraying him as a villain.. all while trying to act as if she were the victim, when in fact.. she was the true domestic abuser. We have seen and listened to the truth.. but not once has she accepted responsibility for her actions. Instead, she and her legal team continue to defame, belittle and falsely accuse not only Johnny Depp.. but now also the Juror(s). She continues to blame everybody else. Amber and her team continue to accept guest spots on show after show.. giving interviews, and feeding the media via Television, Blogs and News articles with absolute lies.

Amber Heard also stated:
“I want to move on with my life. I want to move on, I want to move on, I want Johnny to move on, too. I want him to leave me alone.”

While Mr. Depp has moved on.. she continues on a malicious mission to try and destroy Johnny. So.. we, the people petition that a Gag Order be placed on Amber Heard, and her legal team. We also ask that all media (whether through television, newspaper, online blog site, radio, etc..) channels please STOP giving her platforms to continue spewing these lies. She does NOT speak for true domestic violence survivors. Instead, she causes more problems for domestic violence survivors, especially making it harder for women survivors to speak up & truly be believed. 

As a different petition shared; Hollywood and the entertainment industry must not ignore the suffering of Heard's victim(s), and must not glamorize a domestic abuser. Men are victims of domestic abuse, just like women. This must be recognized, and action must be taken to prevent a known abuser from being celebrated within the entertainment industry. 
PLEASE STOP GIVING HER A PLATFORM TO SPEAK LIES. PLEASE PLACE A GAG ORDER ON MISS HEARD AND HER LEGAL TEAM.
commentable_entity.letter_body: Gag Order placed on Amber Heard & her entire legal team.
